component.text: Processes are individual software programs running concurrently.
One program may be running several times, each in its own process.
Examples of processes running in the Windows operating system
Peripheral devices do not communicate directly on the network.
Hosts send and receive user traffic. A host is a generic name for most end-user devices. A host has an IP network address.
Networking devices connect other devices, mainly hosts – They move and control network traffic

Media provides connections between hosts and network devices. Media can be wired, such as copper and fiber optic or use wireless technologies.” Also label wire between switches as “Fiber Optic cable” and the wires between all other devices and the hubs as “Copper cable” when this hot spot is clicked.
